```{r}
library(bio3d)
library(ggplot2)
fasta <- read.fasta("muscle-I20241202-013848-0634-46176942-p1m.aln-clustalw.fst")
```


```{r}
identity_matrix <- seqidentity(fasta)
identity_matrix
```

```{r}
library(pheatmap)
pheatmap(identity_matrix,
         clustering_distance_rows = "euclidean",  # Distance metric for rows
         clustering_distance_cols = "euclidean",  # Distance metric for columns
         clustering_method = "complete",          # Clustering method
         main = "Sequence Identity Heatmap")  # Title for the heatmap
```
